title: Install Heavy Machinery
description: A field crew needs to install and align a large industrial motor and pump set.

tasks.description: Retrieve the installation drawing for the motor and pump.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew gets the drawing showing the required location and orientation.

tasks.description: Set the motor and pump on the concrete base and perform a rough alignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew physically places the equipment.

tasks.description: Use a laser alignment tool to precisely align the motor and pump shafts, then log the final alignment values in the quality record.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew performs the precision alignment and documents that the final values are within the required tolerance.
